casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Berenyi, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Berenyi (1998), 81 Ohio St.3d 550.]

(No. 97-2276 Submitted March 25, 1998 Decided April 29, 1998.) Joseph R. Burkard, Paulding County Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant. Larry V. DiLabbio, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Golphin (1998), 81 Ohio St.3d 543, 692 N.E.2d 608.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
